| HistoryText             = Undercloaks are the Ninja slaves of the malevolent [[Kuragari (Earth-616)|Kuragari]] in  the [[Realm of the Crimson Dawn]]. He murdered [[Tar (Earth-616)|Tar]], he became the new Proctor of the Dawn, and sent his Undercloaks to claimed [[Elizabeth Braddock (Earth-616)|Psylocke]] for his bride. They attacked [[Warren Worthington III (Earth-616)|Archangel]] and Psylocke in their apartment, leaving behind an engagement ring.{{r|Psylocke and Archangel Crimson Dawn Vol 1 1}} [[Gomurr (Earth-616)|Gomurr]] came to warn them, but was too late, and Psylocke, enchanted by the ring, slipped it on, allowing Kuragari to steal her away to his realm. Archangel followed, but by then, Psylocke had been brainwashed and transformed into Kuragari's Shadow Queen. She left him behind, going with Kuragari.{{r|Psylocke and Archangel Crimson Dawn Vol 1 2}}

Gomurr was next visited by the spirit of the deceased Tar, who named him the next rightful proctor of the [[Crimson Dawn]]. Gomurr accepted, and he joined Archangel in his fight.{{r|Psylocke and Archangel Crimson Dawn Vol 1 3}} In order to free Betsy from the Dawn's influence, Warren sacrificed a piece of his own life force to replace what had been given, and the couple was reunited. Gomurr managed to defeat Kuragari, becoming the next proctor of the Dawn.{{r|Psylocke and Archangel Crimson Dawn Vol 1 4}}
